shortdesc.ph: Gets the number of video formats supported by the specified video capture device.

section.p: You can call this method to get the number of video formats supported by the specified video capture device, and then call to get the corresponding video frame information. The video capture device may support multiple video formats, each with different combinations of frame width, height, and frame rate.
section.note: This method applies to Windows and macOS platforms only.

plentry.pd: ID of the video capture device.

ul.li: > 0: Method call succeeds and returns the number of video formats supported by the device. For example, if the specified camera supports 10 different video formats, the return value is 10.
